txt.en:
[placeholder],

I have news for you in Bree. There is a matter of importance that I wish you to address, as I think that you may be able to learn an important lesson.

Flambard Took
'I am pleased to see you. There is a matter that I think you could help with, and at the same time learn a thing or two about your chosen path.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Flambard Took in Bree
Flambard Took sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Flambard Took. He can be found near the Hunting Lodge in Bree.
